description140: Notion is a note-taking app that's versatile & can be used for many purposes. Free & paid plans, with more flexibility & features with the paid plan. Upgrade to paid when free plan doesn't meet your needs.
description300: Notion is a note-taking app that is extremely versatile and can be used for a variety of purposes. It has a free and paid plan, with the paid plan offering more flexibility and features. When you need more than the free plan offers, you need to upgrade to a paid plan.
author: Bhanu Teja P
